title: Sanctuary Cove Icon: Gold Coast Haven with Lagoon Pool, A$100 Dining Credit, Daily Breakfast & Cocktails
description:
Fall in love with the Gold Coast’s laid-back atmosphere at this five-star Sanctuary Cove reprieve. This idyllic hideaway is superbly set on over nine acres of tropical gardens and boasts a sprawling one-acre lagoon pool so you can soak up the tropics from every luxurious angle.

Dining at this resort is defined by multiple unique culinary experiences. Savour the flavours of wood-fired fare in rustic-chic surrounds at The Fireplace, then dive into a whiskey tasting at the lively Verandah Restaurant & Bar. Treat yourself to high tea or elevate your poolside relaxation with refreshing cocktails and poke bowls influenced by local flavours.

Practise your swing on the neighbouring, critically acclaimed golf courses, or take a stroll to the Marine Village for world-class dining, nightlife, cafes and boutique shopping. Let the little ones run wild in the fun-filled indoor playroom at Planet Trekkers Kids' Club or venture further afar to the world-renowned Gold Coast theme parks, just a 10-minute drive from the resort.
location_description: InterContinental Sanctuary Cove Resort, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Manor Circle, Sanctuary Cove, Hope Island, Queensland 4212, Australia

title: Gold Coast Luxury: InterContinental Sanctuary Cove Resort with Daily Breakfast & A$100 Dining Credit
description:
Fall in love with the Gold Coast’s laidback atmosphere at this five-star Sanctuary Cove reprieve. This idyllic hideaway is superbly set on over four hectares of tropical gardens and boasts a sprawling one-acre lagoon pool, so you can soak up the tropics from every luxurious angle.

Dining at InterContinental Sanctuary Cove Resort is defined by multiple unique culinary experiences. Savour the flavours of wood-fired fare in rustic-chic surrounds at The Fireplace, then dive into a whiskey tasting at the lively Verandah Restaurant and Bar. Treat yourself to a luxurious high tea or elevate your poolside relaxation with refreshing cocktails and poke bowls influenced by local flavours.

Practise your swing on the neighbouring, critically acclaimed golf courses, or take a stroll to the Marine Village for world-class dining, nightlife, cafes and boutique shopping. Let the little ones run wild in the fun-filled indoor playroom at Planet Trekkers Kids' Club or venture further afar to the world-renowned Gold Coast theme parks, just a 10-minute drive from the resort.
location_description: InterContinental Sanctuary Cove Resort, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Manor Circle, Sanctuary Cove, Hope Island, Queensland 4212, Australia

title: Gold Coast Five-Star Sanctuary Cove Retreat with One-Acre Lagoon Beach Pool
description: Fall in love with the Gold Coast's laidback atmosphere at InterContinental Sanctuary Cove Resort, an IHG Hotel. This idyllic hideaway is superbly set on 4.2-hectares of tropical gardens and boasts a sprawling one-acre lagoon pool and four exquisite dining destinations. The world-renowned Gold Coast theme parks are just a 10-minute drive away, and guests can also enjoy easy access to the tranquil Marine Village or critically-acclaimed golf course.
location_description: InterContinental Sanctuary Cove Resort, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Manor Circle, Sanctuary Cove, Hope Island QLD 4212, Australia
